markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Spell Runes](/Feats.aspx?ID=916) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Runescarred](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=21)

**Prerequisites**
[Spell Runes](/Feats.aspx?ID=913)

</column>

---

You gain more powerful spell runes. You gain a spell rune corresponding to a 4th-level [arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1) spell. At 12th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 5th-level arcane spell, and at 14th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 6th-level arcane spell.
name: Greater Spell Runes
